metadata.title: CVE-2020-13630 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
ext/fts3/fts3.c in SQLite before 3.32.0 has a use-after-free infts3EvalNextRow, related to the snippet feature.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13630` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1
libsqlite3-0 - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1
sqlite3 - 3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.31.1-4ubuntu0.1').
